title: Ep. 3: 'The Watch'
description:
On today's episode of 'The Watch," Chris and Andy chat about Marvel's new 'Captain America: Civil War' trailer (3:00 mark), 'Creed' (8:00), 'The Leftovers' (29:00) and 'Homeland' (45:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
